title: Inner Worlds [PCDOS] [FullRip] + Install and Running Instruction
description:
RUNNING INSTRUCTIONS


 1. Rename Inner Worlds to IW and copy the game to a new folder on drive C called "oldgames".


 2. Run Dosbox and type in the following commands to play:



mount c c:oldgames
c:
cd iw
iw (Press Alt+Enter for Fullscreen)



NOTE


If you choose to mess with the sound setup you better make a backup copy of IW, since i've seen this prevents the game from starting.
